welcome.name: Welcome

extractor.name: Extractors API

custom_filters.name: Custom Filters

live_video.name: Livestreams

pause_resume.name: Pause & Resume

cookies.name: Using Cookies

proxy.name: Using Proxy

props.name: queues
props.description: The collection of queues in this player

props.name: client
props.description: The discord client that instantiated this player

params.name: firstResult
params.description: If it should return the first result

methods.name: play
examples: await player.play(message, "never gonna give you up", true)

params.name: firstResult
params.description: If it should play the first result

methods.name: isPlaying
methods.description: Checks if this player is playing in a server

params.name: enabled
params.description: If it should enable the repeat mode

params.name: enabled
params.description: If it should enable the loop mode

methods.name: getTimeCode
methods.description: Returns time code of currently playing song

params.name: queueTime
params.description: If it should make the time code of the whole queue

methods.name: lyrics
methods.description: Gets lyrics of a song You need to have @discord-player/extractor installed in order to use this method!
examples:
const lyrics = await player.lyrics("alan walker faded")
message.channel.send(lyrics.lyrics);

methods.name: _addTrackToQueue
methods.description: Internal method used to add tracks to the queue

methods.name: _addTracksToQueue
methods.description: Same as _addTrackToQueue but used for multiple tracks

methods.name: _playTrack
methods.description: Internal method used to init stream playing

params.name: updateFilter
params.description: If this method was called for audio filter update

events.name: searchResults
events.description: Emitted when the bot is awaiting search results

events.name: searchInvalidResponse
events.description: Emitted when the user has sent an invalid response for search results

events.name: searchCancel
events.description: Emitted when the bot has stopped awaiting search results (timeout)

events.name: noResults
events.description: Emitted when the bot can't find related results to the query

events.name: botDisconnect
events.description: Emitted when the bot is disconnected from the channel

events.name: channelEmpty
events.description: Emitted when the channel of the bot is empty

events.name: queueEnd
events.description: Emitted when the queue of the server is ended

events.name: trackAdd
events.description: Emitted when a track is added to the queue

events.name: playlistAdd
events.description: Emitted when a playlist is added to the queue

events.name: error
events.description: Emitted when an error is triggered. This event should handled properly by the users otherwise it might crash the process!

events.name: playlistParseStart
events.description: Emitted when discord-player attempts to parse playlist contents (mostly soundcloud playlists)

events.name: playlistParseEnd
events.description: Emitted when discord-player finishes parsing playlist contents (mostly soundcloud playlists)

props.name: important
props.description: If player should mark this extractor as important

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Method used by Discord Player to validate query with this extractor

props.name: autoPlay
props.description: If autoplay is enabled in this queue

props.name: guildID
props.description: ID of the guild assigned to this queue

props.name: stopped
props.description: If the player of this queue is stopped

props.name: paused
props.description: If the player of this queue is paused

props.name: repeatMode
props.description: If repeat mode is enabled in this queue

props.name: loopMode
props.description: If loop mode is enabled in this queue

props.name: queue
props.description: The queue in which this track is located

params.name: force
params.description: If it should forcefully get the version

params.name: force
params.description: If it should forcefully get the version

methods.name: isURL
methods.description: Checks if the given string is url

methods.name: isRepl
methods.description: Checks if this system is running in replit.com

methods.name: isVoiceEmpty
methods.description: Checks if the given voice channel is empty

params.name: data
params.description: The data to build time code from

props.name: leaveOnEnd
props.description: If it should leave on queue end

props.name: leaveOnEndCooldown
props.description: Time in ms to wait before executing leaveOnEnd

props.name: leaveOnStop
props.description: If it should leave on stop command

props.name: leaveOnEmpty
props.description: If it should leave on empty voice channel

props.name: leaveOnEmptyCooldown
props.description: Time in ms to wait before executing leaveOnEmpty

props.name: autoSelfDeaf
props.description: If it should set the client to self deaf mode on joining

props.name: enableLive
props.description: If it should enable live videos support

props.name: useSafeSearch
props.description: If it should use safe search method for youtube searches

props.name: disableArtistSearch
props.description: If it should disable artist search for spotify

typedefs.name: TrackSource
typedefs.description:
The type of Track source, either:

  • soundcloud - a stream from SoundCloud
  • youtube - a stream from YouTube
  • arbitrary - arbitrary stream

props.name: fromPlaylist
props.description: If this track came from a playlist

typedefs.name: QueryType
typedefs.description:
The query type, either:

  • soundcloud_track - a SoundCloud Track
  • soundcloud_playlist - a SoundCloud Playlist
  • spotify_song - a Spotify Song
  • spotify_album - a Spotify album
  • spotify_playlist - a Spotify playlist
  • youtube_video - a YouTube video
  • youtube_playlist - a YouTube playlist
  • vimeo - a Vimeo link
  • facebook - a Facebook link
  • reverbnation - a Reverbnation link
  • attachment - an attachment link
  • youtube_search - a YouTube search keyword

props.name: timecodes
props.description: If it should return progres bar with time codes

props.name: queue
props.description: if it should return the progress bar of the whole queue

props.name: length
props.description: The length of progress bar to build
